html:
2025-0977
2025-12-18TB, CBSA, PSFinancial Administration ActAdjustment of Certain Costs Paid or Payable Under the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (April 1, 2019 to October 31, 2024) Remission OrderAdjustment of Certain Costs Paid or Payable Under the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (April 1, 2019 to October 31, 2024) Remission Order in order to remit any outstanding debts resulting from non-collection of inflation-based adjustments to certain fees charged by the Canada Border Services Agency between April 1, 2019 and October 31, 2024.N/A
subject: Adjustment of Certain Costs Paid or Payable Under the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (April 1, 2019 to October 31, 2024) Remission Order
precis: Adjustment of Certain Costs Paid or Payable Under the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (April 1, 2019 to October 31, 2024) Remission Order in order to remit any outstanding debts resulting from non-collection of inflation-based adjustments to certain fees charged by the Canada Border Services Agency between April 1, 2019 and October 31, 2024.
